title: A Biblical Defense Of The Trinity | Unapologetic #68
itunes:title: A Biblical Defense Of The Trinity | Unapologetic #68
description: Charles Spurgeon "No study in Scripture is more interesting or profitable to the Christian than the revelation which is given to us concerning the sacred Trinity, and the various parts which the divine persons take in the work of salvation." So it is to the Trinity we turn today.
